lead_paragraph: RATNER--Laura, on Decem- ber 30, 2015, formerly of Hewlett Harbor. Beloved wife of the late Arthur. Adored mother of Dennis and Andrea and Felice and Jay Seeman. Loving grandma of Allison, Rebecca and Andy, Ari and Brendon. Doting GG of Ethan, Lily and Meyer. We will never forget her strength of mind and body. A graduate of NYU Business School. Avid reader and consummate crossword puzzler. Services will be held 10am, Monday, January 4, 2016 at Boulevard-Riverside Chapels, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, NY 11557. 1/3
